Class CliGitAdd

IGitAdd
public class CliGitAdd
extends java.lang.Object
implements IGitAdd

Command-line implementation of the IGitAdd interface. TODO (gsd216) - to implement exception chaining.

Nested Class Summary
static class CliGitAdd.GitAddParser
          Parser class that implements IParser for implementing a parser for <git-add> output.

public GitAddResponse add(java.io.File repositoryPath,
                          GitAddOptions options,
                          java.util.List<java.io.File> paths)
                   throws JavaGitException,
                          java.io.IOException
Implementations of <git-add> with options and list of files provided.

Specified by:
add in interface IGitAdd
Parameters:
repositoryPath - File path pointing to the root of the repository
options - Object containing all the options that need to be passed to <git-add> command.
paths - List of file paths that are going to be added to the index.
Returns:
GitAddResponse object.
Throws:
JavaGitException - Thrown when there is an error while running the add command.
java.io.IOException - There are many reasons for which an IOException may be thrown. Examples include:
  • a directory doesn't exist
  • access to a file is denied
  • a command is not found on the PATH
